title.en: Aspiration for the Spread of the Teachings of the Eight Chariots of the Practice Lineage

text.en: Countless aeons ago, with a motivation
text.en-trans: drangmé kalpa mangpö gong rol né

text.en: Of intense compassion, you took on the burden
text.en-trans: nyingjé tukkyé drakpo khur zhé té

text.en: Of caring for this realm in a dark and turbulent age—
text.en-trans: tsöden münpé zhing di yong zungwa

text.en: Supreme guide, Lord of Sages, consider this, I pray!
text.en-trans: tön chok tubpé wangpo gong su sol

text.en: When the essential traditions of your supreme vehicle
text.en-trans: gang gi tek chok nyingpö ringluk ni

text.en: Spread to this frigid and snowy land, there arose
text.en-trans: silden khawé jong dir darwa la

text.en: What became known as the eight chariots of the practice lineage—
text.en-trans: drubgyü shingta gyé ché yong drakpé

text.en: May their teachings and adherents spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: ten dang tendzin chok tar gyé gyur chik

text.en: The excellent unrivalled path that upholds, preserves and spreads
text.en-trans: gyalten chi dang nanggyü yoga sum

text.en: The traditions of the general Buddhadharma and three yogas of the inner tantras,
text.en-trans: khyepar ösal dorjé nyingpö sol

text.en: Especially the luminous vajra essence—1
text.en-trans: dzin kyong pelwé lamzang da mepa

text.en: May the teachings of the Lake-Born Conqueror flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Exercising restraint through the three immaculate trainings,
text.en-trans: drimé labpa sum gyi gyü dam shing

text.en: And relying on the Lord of Sages, Avalokiteśvara, Tārā and Acala
text.en-trans: tubwang chenzik drolma miyowa

text.en: As infallible and enduring sources of protection—
text.en-trans: miché ten gyi kyab su nyer tenpé

text.en: May the teachings of the Jowo Kadampas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: jowo kadam tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Skilled in upholding Atiśa’s sublime tradition in particular
text.en-trans: khyepar ati sha yi ringluk chok

text.en: Through flawless study and practice and pure Vinaya observance,
text.en-trans: shedrub drima mepé dzin khé shing

text.en: And able thereby to nourish the entire wealth-bearing world—
text.en-trans: dul dzin tsangmé nordzin geng nüpé

text.en: May the teachings of the Riwo Gendenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: riwo geden tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Upon the basis of the wisdom intent of the five patriarchs,2
text.en-trans: jampal yeshe sempé tukjé gar

text.en: Compassionate emanations of the wisdom being Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: gongma nam ngé tukgong nyingpö til

text.en: Emphasising the practices of Hevajra and Path with its Fruit—
text.en-trans: kyé dor lamdré nyamlen tsor jepé

text.en: May the glorious Sakya teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: palden sakyé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Teachings from the lineage of the mahāsiddhas Nāropa and Maitripāda,
text.en-trans: drubchen naropa dang metriwé

text.en: The tradition of practising the six dharmas as the path of skilful means
text.en-trans: gyüpé kasol tab lam chö druk dang

text.en: And the Great Seal (Mahāmudrā) as the path of liberation—
text.en-trans: drollam chakgya chenpo nyam zhepé

text.en: May the teachings of the Kagyüpas, protectors of beings, flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dro gön kagyü tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In addition, may all the pure, nonsectarian teachings of the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: zhenyang zhijé shangpa jonang dang

text.en: Such as the Pacification, Shangpa Kagyü, Jonang,
text.en-trans: nyendrub lasok ri su machepé

text.en: Approach and Accomplishment and so on,
text.en-trans: namdak gyalwé tenpa jinyé kün

text.en: Continue to flourish and spread even unto the ends of existence!
text.en-trans: sipé tar yang yongsu gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the blessings of the Three Jewels, Three Roots and Dharma Guardians,
text.en-trans: chok sum tsa sum sungmé jinlab dang

text.en: And through the power of the pure dharmatā and phenomenal interdependence,
text.en-trans: chönyi namdak chöchen tendrel tü

text.en: May all the hopes and aspirations within my mind—
text.en-trans: dak gi yi la mönpé ré dré kün

text.en: Each and every one of them—be perfectly fulfilled, I pray!
text.en-trans: malü yongsu drubpar dzé du sol
